name: S3SetMetaData
description: Sets the metadata on bucket or object. You can provide the endpoint as a bucket/object definition (S3SetMetaData(bucket:"mybucket",object:"myobject.txt",metadata:data) ) or as a virtual filesystem path (S3SetMetaData(path:"s3://mybucket/myobject.txt",metadata:data) ).

params.name: bucketNameOrPath
params.description: This can be the bucketname or a virtual filesystem path for a file/directory (example "s3://mybucket/myobject.txt").

params.name: objectName
params.description: Name of the object (path) within the bucket of your object to read. In case you have defined a bucket with the first argument.

params.name: accessKeyId
params.description: S3 accessKeyId, if not defined it checks the system property/environment variable for [lucee.s3.accesskeyid].

params.name: secretAccessKey
params.description: S3 secretAccessKey, if not defined it checks the system property/environment variable for [lucee.s3.secretaccesskey].

params.name: host
params.description: the provider to connect, if not set Amazon AWS is used.
